hudson.tasks.Shell.command: OPENSHIFT_HOST=$KUBERNETES_SERVICE_HOST:$KUBERNETES_SERVICE_PORT echo "OPENSHIFT_HOST=$OPENSHIFT_HOST" > build_props DOCKER_REGISTRY=`osc get services --server=https://$OPENSHIFT_HOST --insecure-skip-tls-verify=true | grep docker-registry | awk '{print $4}'` echo "DOCKER_REGISTRY=$DOCKER_REGISTRY" >> build_props cat build_props

buildId=`osc --server=https://$OPENSHIFT_HOST --insecure-skip-tls-verify=true start-build camel-cdi-build` echo "Started Build with ID '$buildId'" echo "Waiting for Build to Complete"
# check that the build test image deployed successfully set +e buildResult="Waiting" count=0 attempts=50
while [ $buildResult != "Complete" -a $count -lt $attempts ]; do buildResult=`osc --server=https://$OPENSHIFT_HOST --insecure-skip-tls-verify=true get builds $buildId | grep $buildId | awk '{ print $3 }'` if [ "$buildResult" != "Complete" ]; then count=$(($count+1)) echo "Result was '$buildResult' for Attempt $count/$attempts" sleep 10 fi done set -e
if [ $count -eq $attempts ]; then echo "Failed to reach test deployment" exit 1 fi
